member.name: WBEM_QUERY_FLAG_TYPE
member.summary: Contains flags used to define a query or enumerator.

member.name: WBEM_QUERY_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_DEEP
member.summary: Include the specified class and all subclasses.

member.name: WBEM_QUERY_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_SHALLOW
member.summary: Include only the specified class, not any subclasses.

member.name: WBEM_QUERY_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_PROTOTYPE
member.summary: Used for prototyping. It does not execute the query and instead returns an object that looks like a typical result object.
